```{r}

```

Let's import datasets.

```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("dataset/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", "", "."))
litters_df = 
    janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
pups_df = 
    read_csv("dataset/FAS_pups.csv",
        na = c(".", "NA", ""), 
        skip = 3)
pups_df = 
    janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
